name: The Sexuality Information and Education Council of the United States
summary: National, nonprofit organization dedicated to advancing sex education through advocacy, policy, and coalition building.

name: Reproductive Health Access Project
summary: Nonprofit organization that seeks to integrate abortion, contraception, and miscarriage care into mainstream medicine.

name: National Coalition for Sexual Health
summary: Coalition that envisions a nation where people feel comfortable talking about sexual health and have access to the information and services needed to support positive and healthy choices, without facing stigma or discrimination.

name: Population Services International
summary: Nonprofit global health organization with a mission to make it easier for all people to lead healthier lives and plan the families they desire.

name: Ibis Reproductive Health
summary: Driving change through bold, rigorous research and principles partnerships that advance sexual and reproductive autonomy, choices, and health worldwide.

name: National Women's Health Network
summary: Improving health by strategically shaping policy, expanding access, and providing accurate, unbiased information.

name: Planned Parenthood
summary: Providing reproductive and sexual healthcare and education in the US and globally.

name: Guttmacher Institute
summary: Research and policy NGO aiming to improve sexual health and expand reproductive rights worldwide.
